transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello, Jai Maa Bhavani company se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Haa boliye.
Executive: Yes sir, main Riya bol rahi hu IndiaMART head office se. Kal baat hui thi na to aapne aaj 12 baje ke baad bola tha. Actually, thoda ek meeting thi to main thoda busy ho gayi thi. Isliye main us time aapko call nahi kar payi thi. Abhi baat ho sakti hai?
Customer: Haa.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji ho sakti hai.
Executive: Aapne bola tha na sir hum system se isko login karenge, pura check karenge.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Ji, to abhi aap system pe hai?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Just a second, main aapko link share kar deti hu. Ek second. Aapki jo official mail ID hai us pe hi kar du?
Customer: WhatsApp pe kar do.
Executive: Okay, ek second wait rukiye.

Executive: Just a second.
Executive: Isi wale WhatsApp pe karna hai?
Customer: Haan ji kar do. Lekin laptop bhi kharab ho rakha hai.


Customer: Ye glitch kyu nahi ho raha hai kya?
Customer: Wapas se refresh karo mere yaha pe bhi glitch lag gaya.
Customer: Ab padh gaya web bhi RP ka glitch hai.

Customer: Are thik hai thik hai thoda network me to ready hai to.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Sir aawaz aa rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Aa rahi hai.
Executive: Just a second main aapko link share kar rahi hu.

Executive: Ek second sir, on main usko select karti hu aapko.


Customer: Namaskar.
Customer: Kya iske liye to main ready nahi tha.
Customer: Do barbaar to update hi nahi ho raha hai. Update hi nahi ho pa rahi hai. Kab tak live hoga wo nahi bata sakta bhai.
Customer: Kya pending hai ye bhi refresh kar.
Customer: Kara diya.
Executive: Ji ji sir.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Sir actually kya hai na wo link hi nahi generate ho raha. Hamare yaha pe shayad kuch technical glitch aa raha hai. Main usi ko try kar rahi hu. Aap mujhe tab tak ek cheez batayenge ki uske baad kal jo hamari baat hui thi uske baad aapne kuch bhi cheez dekha, check kiya?
Customer: Jaise ki?
Executive: Jaise ki aap hamara issue tha na sir aap bol rahe the lead pe jo hai wo like requirement buyer ka nahi hai wo fake inquiry kar raha hai uske regarding aapne uske baad lead consume ki, purchase ki to kuch change laga ya fir kuch aur same cheez aayi?
Customer: Maine subah press lead li ek. Hmm.
Customer: Nahi requirement.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Aaj ek lead li usme bol raha hai ki nahi mere ko requirement.
Executive: Aapne aaj bhi ek lead li usme aapko buyer bol raha hai ki meri aaj bhi requirement nahi hai.
Customer: Hmm meri koi requirement nahi hai.
Executive: Wo lead kitni der pehle ki thi sir?
Customer: 21 minutes se bhi thi.
Executive: 21 minutes ago okay.
Customer: 30 ya 21.
Executive: Haan haan.
Executive: Okay. Aur sir uske alawa aur koi jo call aur inquiry aapko aayi us pe baat hui kuch us pe kuch kis koi customer ne aisa bola?
Customer: Aur do the aaj ke.
Customer: Is month abhi aaj ko main hata du to kal tak aapko paanch calls aayi hai total, right? Aur is month ki inquiry bhi aapko jo hai ab tak almost 25 to 30 ke around inquiries bhi aayi hai. Is month ki buyleads baat karte main to aapne 26 buyleads bhi consume ki hui hai. To.
Customer: Main dekh pa hi nahi hu inquiry matlab bahut pichle matlab August ke month bahut dekha tha bas. Tab se to bilkul hi ghatiya aate hai customer. Wo response hi nahi dete wo.
Executive: Inquiry wale bhi response nahi dete hai?
Executive: Sir matlab aap keh rahe hai to ye cheez main ek baar dekhti hu otherwise inquiry pe to even conversion zyada hota hai. Matlab kya hota hai buylead pe to customer bol sakta hai matlab usne apni requirement dali hai usme char log aur aapke alawa baat karenge. To waha pe hota hai ki buyer aapko denial mode mein aata hai lekin inquiry aur calls wo to specifically hi aapke product aur aapki profile ko dekh ke aati hai na. Particular customer aapko connect karta hai waha pe.
Executive: To aap waha inquiry sir hum alag tarike se check karte hai na filter lagate hai direct inquiry ka to hume hamare lead manager pe inquiries visible hoti hai. Aap us tarike se check karte hai ya nahi karte hai?
Customer: Kaise filter?
Executive: Sir aap lead manager pe jaiye.
Customer: Ek ek ek ek.
Executive: Aap lead manager pe gaye? Uski bhi de sakte hai kya?
Executive: Haan ji waha pe jo upar aapke search bar ke just bagal mein ek filter ka option bana hai na?
Customer: Search ka?
Executive: Haan haan filter filter. Reminder ke just upar ek chota sa aise filter wo jo funnel nahi hota waisa sa ek option bana hua hai ek symbol hai.
Executive: Ji ab waha pe aapko ye filters mein jab aap jayenge to aise location aur source date likha dikh raha hai?
Customer: No fresh wala aa raha hai ek filter.
Executive: Uske bagal nahi sir fresh ye hum quick filters pe quick filters ke bagals mein filters zero pe click kariye. Kiya?
Executive: Upar top pe haan wo jo top fresh ke upar frequently used filter uske upar quick filter uske bagal filters likha hai na?
Customer: Lead manager mein hi baat kar rahe hai na?
Executive: Aap bilkul bilkul sir lead manager pe pehle aapko.
Customer: Aur ek star ka option hai aur ek three dots ka option hai.
Executive: Lead manager pe mobile se open kiya ya kis se open kiya hai aapne?
Customer: PC pe karna hai.
Executive: Sir main puch rahi hu aapne kis se open kiya mobile se ya system se?
Customer: Mobile.
Executive: Mobile pe to mobile mein main batati hu mobile mein alag se dikhega mobile mein aap more option pe click kariye more likha dikh raha hai?
Customer: Hmm dikhega.
Executive: Ji more pe click kariye aur fir dekhiye direct dikh raha hai?
Customer: Direct.
Executive: Ji usko direct ko niche se apply kariye.
Customer: Upar pe click karke matlab more pe click hi nahi ho raha.
Customer: More pe click nahi ho raha.

Executive: Ek baar refresh karke wapas click karke dekhiye na sir.
Customer: Suniye ye wala number likhiye 63.
Executive: Ek second.
Customer: 63.
Customer: 52.
Executive: 52?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: 968.
Executive: 968.
Customer: 767.
Executive: 767 ji kaun kiska number hai ye?
Customer: Mera hi hai is pe call kariye na internet nahi chal raha.
Executive: Okay main aapko directly nahi sir call to aise hi aayega recorded hi matlab IndiaMART help se hi call jayega aapka concern open hai na to direct call nahi lag payega is number pe bhi. Main is number se call haan call karti hu aayega aapko aise hi okay?
Customer: Haan haan samajh gaya.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is facing issues with buyleads quality.

- Customer is unable to apply filters on mobile.

- Customer states inquiries and calls are not responsive.



Resolution:

- Executive tried to share a link for system check.

- Executive explained how to apply filters on mobile.

- Executive offered to call back from IndiaMART help.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back from IndiaMART help.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, filters, lead manager, inquiries
